column5: I drove the route (417 to Nicholas to Quebec # 5 for Maniwaki) today on my way to Wakefield (restaurent there to celebrate Mother's day for my wife as well as her birthday). Absolutely no problems. Roads are well marked.For the out-of-towners, once on Nicholas, first traffic light is Laurier. Second traffic light after Laurier is Besserer (turn right). Go 2 blocks and turn left on King Edward. And you're on your way (about 2 kilometers to the Quebec border - middle of the bridge over the Ottawa river).
